gurps-gridless.keybindings.showRangeIndi: Show reach indicator for controled token.
Show reach indicator for all tokens.
gurps-gridless.settings.maxReachShown.de: Maximal Reach shown in reach indicator.
gurps-gridless.settings.innerBorderWidth: Width of the inner border in px.
gurps-gridless.settings.outerBorderWidth: Width of the outer border in px.
gurps-gridless.settings.reachLineAlpha.d: Opacity of the reach lines in the reach indicator.
gurps-gridless.settings.facingAlpha.name: Facing area opacity
gurps-gridless.settings.facingAlpha.desc: Opacity of the facing areas in the reach indicator.
gurps-gridless.tokenSettings.maxReachSho: Leave empty to use global setting
gurps-gridless.tokenSettings.centerOffse: Shifts the center of rotation. The center of rotation in foundry defaults to the center of the object. With GURPS it should be at the head of the creature.
gurps-gridless.tokenSettings.artRotation: Rotate art to face in the right direction (downward) inside the tolken border. The About Face rotation offset will instead rotate the wohle token incl. border.
gurps-gridless.tokenSettings.tab.name: GURPS Gridless
